scripts.clean: rm -Rf src/client/stylesheets/bootstrap src/client/stylesheets/font-awesome src/client/stylesheets/react-select static/stylesheets/* static/js/* lib/*
scripts.prepublish: npm run clean && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy-bootstrap && npm run copy-font-awesome && npm run copy-react-select && npm run copy-react-virtualized && npm run copy-virtualized-select && npm run copy-select2
scripts.build-client-js: cd src/client/controllers; browserify -t [babelify] ../../../templates/layout.js editor/edit.js entity/creator.js entity/edition.js entity/publication.js entity/publisher.js entity/work.js deletion.js login.js relationship.js search.js -p [ factor-bundle -o ../../../static/js/layout.js -o ../../../static/js/editor/edit.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/creator.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/edition.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/publication.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/publisher.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/work.js -o ../../../static/js/deletion.js -o ../../../static/js/login.js -o ../../../static/js/relationship.js -o ../../../static/js/search.js ] > ../../../static/js/bundle.js
scripts.prestart: npm run build-less & npm run build-client-js & npm run build-server-js
scripts.watch-server-js: cross-env DEBUG=bbsite nodemon src/server/app.js --watch src/server --exec babel-node
scripts.watch-client-js: cd src/client/controllers; watchify -t [babelify] ../../../templates/layout.js editor/edit.js entity/creator.js entity/edition.js entity/publication.js entity/publisher.js entity/work.js deletion.js login.js relationship.js search.js -p [ factor-bundle -o ../../../static/js/layout.js -o ../../../static/js/editor/edit.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/creator.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/edition.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/publication.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/publisher.js -o ../../../static/js/entity/work.js -o ../../../static/js/deletion.js -o ../../../static/js/login.js -o ../../../static/js/relationship.js -o ../../../static/js/search.js ] -o ../../../static/js/bundle.js -dv
scripts.debug: npm run watch-less & npm run watch-client-js & npm run watch-server-js
scripts.lint: eslint --ext .js --ext .jsx src test templates scripts gulpfile.js
